insert
into tb_dtpaper ( dp_no , emp_no , dp_title , dp_final , dp_category , dp_origin , dp_change
) values (
10||seq_vac.nextval
20||seq_otw.nextval
30||seq_res.nextval
40||seq_coop.nextval
, #{ empNo } , #{ dpTitle } , '임시저장' , #{ dpCategory } , #{ dpOrigin } , #{ dpChange } )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tb_dtpaper where emp_no = #{empNo} and dp_final = '임시저장'
'반려됨'
and dp_status = 'N'

select d.dp_no , dp_category , dp_title , dp_origin , dp_change , dp_final , to_char(dp_create, 'YYYY-MM-DD')as dp_create , (select emp_name from tb_sign join tb_employee on (signemp_no = emp_no) where si_status = 'R' and dp_no = d.dp_no) as "sign_empname" , (select dep_name from tb_sign join tb_employee e on (signemp_no = e.emp_no) join tb_department using (dep_cd) where si_status = 'R' and dp_no = d.dp_no) as "sign_empdept" from tb_dtpaper d join tb_employee e on (d.emp_no = e.emp_no) where d.emp_no = #{empNo} and dp_final = '임시저장'
'반려됨'
and dp_status = 'N' order by dp_create desc, d.dp_no desc

select d.dp_no , dp_category , dp_title , dp_origin , dp_change , dp_final , to_char(dp_create, 'YYYY-MM-DD')as dp_create , (select emp_name from tb_sign join tb_employee on (signemp_no = emp_no) where si_seq = (select max(si_seq) from tb_sign where dp_no = d.dp_no) and dp_no = d.dp_no ) as "sign_empname" , (select dep_name from tb_sign join tb_employee e on (signemp_no = e.emp_no) join tb_department using (dep_cd) where si_seq = (select max(si_seq) from tb_sign where dp_no = d.dp_no) and dp_no = d.dp_no ) as "sign_empdept" , (select to_char(si_appdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as si_appdate from tb_sign where si_seq = (select max(si_seq) from tb_sign where dp_no = d.dp_no) and dp_no = d.dp_no ) as "last_signdate" from tb_dtpaper d join tb_employee e on (d.emp_no = e.emp_no) where d.emp_no = #{empNo} and dp_final in ('진행중', '대기')
('결재완료')
and dp_status = 'N' order by dp_create desc

select count(*) from tb_dtpaper where emp_no = #{empNo} and dp_final in ('진행중', '대기')
('결재완료')
and dp_status = 'N'

select count(*) from tb_sign s join tb_dtpaper dt on (s.dp_no = dt.dp_no) join tb_employee e on (dt.emp_no = e.emp_no) join tb_department d on (e.dep_cd = d.dep_cd) where si_status = 'C' and dt.dp_status = 'N' and signemp_no = #{ empNo } and e.dep_cd != #{ depCd }

select count(*) from tb_sign s join tb_dtpaper dt on (s.dp_no = dt.dp_no) join tb_employee e on (dt.emp_no = e.emp_no) join tb_department d on (e.dep_cd = d.dep_cd) where si_status = 'Y' and dt.dp_status = 'N' and signemp_no = #{ empNo } and e.dep_cd != #{ depCd }

select dt.dp_no , dt.emp_no as emp_no , e.emp_name as emp_name , d.dep_name as sign_deptname , dt.dp_title , to_char(dt.dp_create, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dp_create , dt.dp_category , ( select sse.emp_name from tb_sign ss join tb_employee sse on(ss.signemp_no = sse.emp_no) where ss.dp_no = s.dp_no and ss.si_seq = s.si_asign ) as sign_empname , ( select ssd.dep_name from tb_sign ss join tb_employee sse on(ss.signemp_no = sse.emp_no) join tb_department ssd on (sse.dep_cd = ssd.dep_cd) where ss.dp_no = s.dp_no and ss.si_seq = s.si_asign ) as sign_empdept from tb_sign s join tb_dtpaper dt on (s.dp_no = dt.dp_no) join tb_employee e on (dt.emp_no = e.emp_no) join tb_department d on (e.dep_cd = d.dep_cd) where si_status = 'C' and dt.dp_status = 'N' and signemp_no = #{ empNo } and e.dep_cd = #{ depCd } order by dp_create desc

select count(*) from tb_sign s join tb_dtpaper dt on (s.dp_no = dt.dp_no) join tb_employee e on (dt.emp_no = e.emp_no) join tb_department d on (e.dep_cd = d.dep_cd) where si_status = 'C' and dt.dp_status = 'N' and signemp_no = #{ empNo } and e.dep_cd = #{ depCd }

select dp_no ,d.emp_no ,dp_title ,dp_category ,e.emp_name as emp_name ,dep_name as sign_empdept ,dp_origin ,dp_change ,dp_final from tb_dtpaper d join tb_employee e on(d.emp_no = e.emp_no) join tb_department dd on(e.dep_cd = dd.dep_cd) where dp_no = #{no}

select d.dp_no ,d.emp_no ,dp_title ,dp_create ,dp_modify ,dp_status ,dp_final ,dp_category ,dp_origin ,dp_change ,substr(va_start, 1, instr(va_start, ',') - 1) as va_start ,substr(va_start, instr(va_start, ',') + 1) as va_starttime ,substr(va_end, 1, instr(va_end, ',') - 1) as va_end ,substr(va_end, instr(va_end, ',') + 1) as va_endtime ,va_end ,va_category ,va_content from tb_dtpaper d join tb_vacation v on (d.dp_no = v.dp_no) where d.dp_no = #{no}
